_metadata.description: Date calculation formulas for working days and business calendars

working_days.description: Calculate number of working days between two dates excluding weekends and holidays

add_working_days.description: Add working days to a start date, skipping weekends and holidays

parameters.num_days: Number of working days to add

sprint_number.description: Generate sprint number in YY.Q.# format from date

parameters.date: Date cell reference to convert to sprint number

sprint_start_date.description: Calculate sprint start date from year, quarter, and sprint number

sprint_end_date.description: Calculate sprint end date (2 weeks from start)
